mapper.select: SELECT loginId ,name ,tel ,mail ,join_date FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_type LIKE 'B' AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY loginId DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(loginId)as tut_Total FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_type LIKE 'B' AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num , L.lec_id, L.tutor_id , L.lec_name , L.tutor_name , DATE_FORMAT( L.c_st, '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS c_st , DATE_FORMAT( L.c_end, '%Y.%m.%d') AS c_end , L.pre_pnum , S.que_num , S.que_one + S.que_two + S.que_three + S.que_four + S.que_five AS srvy_Pnum FROM tb_lec_info L LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_srvy_static S ON L.lec_id = S.lec_id AND S.que_num = 1 WHERE L.tutor_id LIKE #{tutor_id} AND (@rownum:=0)=0 ORDER BY L.c_st DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT A.que ,A.que_num ,A.que_one AS answer_1 ,B.que_one AS sum_1 ,A.que_two AS answer_2 ,B.que_two AS sum_2 ,A.que_three AS answer_3 ,B.que_three AS sum_3 ,A.que_four AS answer_4 ,B.que_four AS sum_4 ,A.que_five AS answer_5 ,B.que_five AS sum_5 FROM tb_srvy_que A ,tb_srvy_static B WHERE B.que_num = A.que_num AND A.que_num = #{que_num} AND B.lec_id LIKE #{lec_id}
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num ,lec_rv FROM tb_srvy_rv WHERE lec_id LIKE #{lec_id} AND (@rownum:=0)=0 ORDER BY lec_rv DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
